name: Arcane Sorcery

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Arcane Sorcery GreenLight/Arcane Sorcery GreenLight.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Arcane Sorcery GreenLight/Arcane Sorcery GreenLight.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: adobeair
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: -silent -eulaAccepted
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
